import React , { Fragment , useState , useContext} from 'react'; import UserContext from '../../context/user/userContext'; const Register = () => { const [user , setUser] = useState({ firstName : '', lastName : '', userName : '', password : '', password2 : '', email : '', role : 'typical' }); const userContext = useContext(UserContext); const { registerUser } = userContext; const {firstName , lastName , userName , password , password2 , email , role} = user; const onChange = e => setUser({...user , [e.target.name] : e.target.value}); const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); registerUser({ firstName , lastName , userName , password , email }) } return (

Account Register



 ) } export default Register
